synopsis.p: Reads files in XMI format using the AlvisNLP/ML proxy filesystem.

description.p: reads source streams in XMI format. The source must contain documents and annotations using the AlvisNLP/ML proxy filesystem.

param-doc.name: active
param-doc.p: This expression is evaluated as a boolean with the corpus as the context element, the module will process the document only if the result is true.

param-doc.name: constantAnnotationFeatures
param-doc.p: Constant features to add to each annotation created by this module

param-doc.name: constantDocumentFeatures
param-doc.p: Constant features to add to each document created by this module

param-doc.name: constantRelationFeatures
param-doc.p: Constant features to add to each relation created by this module

param-doc.name: constantSectionFeatures
param-doc.p: Constant features to add to each section created by this module

param-doc.name: constantTupleFeatures
param-doc.p: Constant features to add to each tuple created by this module

param-doc.name: source
param-doc.p: Location where to read XMI file(s).

param-doc.name: defaultSectionName
param-doc.p: Name of the section for documents created out of XMI files that do not use the AlvisNLP/ML Proxy typesystem.

param-doc.name: baseNameId
param-doc.p: Use only the basename of source for documents created out of XMI files that do not use the AlvisNLP/ML Proxy typesystem (by default, use the absolute path).

param-doc.name: userFunctions
param-doc.p: Set user functions available for this module. If this module is a sequence, then all compounds inherit its functions.
